About me

I am a writer.

I write code to solve real-world problems and poetry to live them. I write in English, Vietnamese, Chinese, Java, C++, Python, Javascript, HTML and CSS.

View Resume

Projects

GYST Inventory Tracker

Get Your Stats Together - GYST was inspired to help small businesses with inventory tracking. The application was designed and developed for a cross-platform functionality using Electron and Firebase. I took part in implementing Victory library for charts and graphs for visualisation and Semantic UI to enhance the overall outlook of the application.

See Live Source Code

SafeRide

SafeRide is a web application created to bicycle riders finding the best cycling route with hazards detection capability. The application was built on Vue.j, C# and SQL Server Management with Mapbox API.

See Live Source Code

EBC - BeachHacks 2022

E-Biz Card - EBC was inspired by a personal experience of the hassle of traditional physical business cards. Together with the new technology development, a digital version of business cards was borned. EBC is an Android application that implements Java and Google Cloud Storage. The application stores a digital version of a business card and allows access through a unique QR code.

See Live Source Code
